WaitArt una empresa de Ewest SpA: WaitArt a company of Ewest SpA
PRIMERO GENERALIDADES\n\nEl presente doc:
FIRST GENERALITIES

This document regulates the general terms and conditions applicable to the access and use that the User will make of the Website www.waitart.com (hereinafter waitart.com or the Website interchangeably), as well as any type of information, content, image, video, audio, or other material communicated or present on the Website.

For the purposes of this document, the Website shall be understood as the external appearance of the screen interfaces, both statically and dynamically, that is, the navigation tree; and all elements integrated both in the screen interfaces and in the navigation tree (hereinafter, Contents) and all those services or online resources that may be offered to users (hereinafter, Services).

Ewest Chile SpA reserves the right to modify, at any time, and without prior notice, the presentation and configuration of the Website and the Contents and Services that may be incorporated therein, as well as these Terms and Conditions. The User acknowledges and accepts that at any time Ewest Chile SpA may interrupt, deactivate, and/or cancel any of these elements integrated into the Website or access to them.

The access and use of the website and related or annexed content described in this document will be governed entirely by the laws of the Republic of Chile. Consequently, visits, as well as possible contracts or transactions that the user carries out on the platform represented by the website, as well as the legal effects that these may have, are subject to the laws and jurisdiction of the courts of justice of the Republic of Chile. Of particular importance is the application of Law No. 19.628 on the Protection of Personal Data and Law No. 19.496 on Consumer Rights.

Additionally, this website and its contents, as well as the transactions that may be carried out on it, are intended for all types of users, regardless of their nationality and place of residence, although there is primacy regarding the application of Chilean legislation for specific cases.

Users are advised to carefully read the content of these General Terms and Conditions of Use, as well as to print and keep a copy of them on a local storage disk unit or portable storage for their convenience and security.
SEGUNDO INFORMACIÓN DEL SITIO WEB\n\nLa:
SECOND WEBSITE INFORMATION

The ownership of waitart.com belongs to Ewest Chile SpA, RUT 77.662.015-7.

Additionally, for any type of communication, presentation, inquiry, or complaints related to the use or operation of the Website, or with the contracts and transactions that have been carried out, waitart.com will receive all types of communications at the email contacto@waitart.com, which will only be available for Customer Service purposes. Ewest Chile SpA is domiciled for these purposes at Agustinas 1442 OF 402, Santiago - Chile.

The Website also has a customer service department, where various presentations or complaints related to the use or access to the page, as well as the businesses and transactions carried out on the website, can be made. This department can be contacted at the email address contacto@waitart.com or via the phone number or WhatsApp +56 9 5823 2080.
TERCERO USUARIO\n\nEl acceso a este Siti:
THIRD USER

Access to this Website, navigation, and use of it, as well as any space enabled for interactions between Users, or between the User and the Website (comment sections, blogging and microblogging spaces, and extensions intended for this function), will grant individuals the status of 'User.' Therefore, it is understood that the Terms and Conditions present in this document are accepted from the moment of accessing the Website or its contents, as well as any future modifications made to the Terms and Conditions, notwithstanding any future legislation enacted in the Republic of Chile intended to regulate this type of document or applicable to the use of Websites.

Additionally, and beyond the cost of the internet connection paid by the User where applicable, access to the contents and services of the Website, in whole or in part, whether they come from waitart.com or third parties, is subject to prior contracting, which will require payment by the User as consideration to access these contents and services.
REGISTRO DEL USUARIO\n\nSerá requisito n:
USER REGISTRATION

It will be a necessary requirement for the use of the Website, as well as for carrying out transactions, purchasing products, and contracting services offered through this medium, to accept these Terms and Conditions at the time of registration by the User. Additionally, the User must designate an access key or password.

These Terms and Conditions will be deemed known and accepted by the mere act of registering the User, an act in which the User will include an express statement of knowledge of these terms of use.

The registration of each User will be verified by completing and signing the form provided for this purpose by the Website, as well as its subsequent submission, which will be finalized by the User clicking on the respective element within the Website.
CLAVE SECRETA\n\nUna vez registrado, el:
SECRET KEY

Once registered, the User will have at their disposal a username and a password or secret key, through which they will not only be able to access the Website and its contents but also have personalized, confidential, and secure access. The User will have the option to change their password or secret key, for which a regulated procedure will exist within the Website and its structure.

The User fully assumes responsibility for maintaining the confidentiality of their password or secret key registered on the Website. This password or key is for personal use, so its voluntary disclosure to third parties by the User does not entail any responsibility on the part of waitart.com, nor its affiliates and representatives, in the event of malicious use.
RESPONSABILIDAD DE LOS USUARIOS\n\nwaita:
USER RESPONSIBILITY

waitart.com provides the User with a service characterized by the diversity of the content provided. The User assumes responsibility when accessing the Website to make proper use of it and its contents. This responsibility will extend, but not be limited to:

1.- Using the information, Contents, and/or Services and data offered by waitart.com, without contravening these Terms and Conditions, as well as Chilean Legal Order, Morality, and Public Order, or in any other way that could lead to the violation of third-party rights or the normal functioning and operations of the Website.

2.- The truthfulness and legality of the data and information provided by the User in the registration forms present on the Website. In any case, the User will immediately notify waitart.com of any event related to the misuse of information registered in these forms, such as, but not limited to, theft, loss, or unauthorized access to identifiers and/or passwords, in order to proceed with their immediate cancellation.

Ewest Chile SpA reserves the right to review and remove all comments and/or content such as photos, videos, and interactions from Users and creators that violate the law, respect for human dignity, are discriminatory based on race, nationality, sex, sexual orientation, lineage, or condition, as well as those that constitute messages known as spam, or that threaten youth or children, order, or public safety, whether before or after being published, to verify the age of participants, thus ensuring compliance with these terms and conditions and any applicable legal regulations, leaving it to the discretion of waitart.com to determine whether the content is appropriate for the Website.

In any case, Ewest Chile SpA is not responsible for opinions of any kind expressed by Users through comments or blogging or microblogging tools or extensions.

Simple access to www.waitart.com does not imply a commercial relationship between waitart.com and the User.
CAPACIDAD LEGAL\n\nEl Usuario declara se:
LEGAL CAPACITY

The User declares to be of legal age and, therefore, to have the necessary and sufficient legal capacity to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Therefore, waitart.com is not intended for minors, declining any responsibility for non-compliance with this requirement.

 Even so, the legal rules of capacity established in the legal system will govern in all cases where their application is pertinent. Therefore, if a person does not have the legal capacity to contract, they must refrain from using the Contents and Services that require such capacity. waitart.com may, at any time, temporarily or permanently suspend the participation of users who are proven to lack the legal capacity to use the Services and Content that require it, or who provide false, inaccurate, or fraudulent information to the Website.

The Website www.waitart.com is primarily aimed at Users residing in the Republic of Chile. waitart.com does not guarantee that the Website complies, partially or fully, with the legislation of other countries. If the User resides or is domiciled in a foreign country and decides to access and/or browse this Website, they will do so at their own responsibility, ensuring that such access and browsing comply with the provisions of the local legislation applicable to them, with Ewest Chile SpA assuming no responsibility that may arise from such access.
CUARTO DERECHOS Y GARANTÍAS DEL USUARIO:
FOURTH RIGHTS AND GUARANTEES OF THE WEBSITE USER

The User will enjoy all the rights recognized by the consumer protection legislation in force in Chile, in addition to the rights granted by these Terms and Conditions. Furthermore, the User will always have the rights to information, rectification, and cancellation of personal data in accordance with Law No. 19.628 on the protection of personal data.
QUINTO MEDIOS DE PAGO\n\nLos servicios q:
FIFTH PAYMENT METHODS

The services reported and transacted on this site may only be paid through:

1.- Bank credit cards such as Visa, Mastercard, Diners Club International, American Express, or others enabled and validly issued in Chile or abroad.

2.- Bank debit cards under the Redcompra system or enabled to make payments and transactions through the WebPay system, validly issued in Chile by national banks.

Other payment methods that may be announced and accepted in the future, which will be duly informed through the appropriate channels and means.

Payment with debit cards will be made through WebPay, which is an electronic payment system responsible for automatically charging the user's bank account.

The User declares that they understand that these payment methods or portals are owned by third-party companies or individuals providing such services, independent and not linked to Ewest Chile SpA. Therefore, the continuity of their service provision over time, as well as the proper functioning of their tools and online payment buttons, are the sole responsibility of the providers of these services and in no case of waitart.com.
SEXTO RESPONSABILIDAD\n\nEwest Chile SpA:
SIXTH RESPONSIBILITY

Ewest Chile SpA will not be liable, under any circumstances, for the following events:

1.- Improper use by Users or visitors to the Website of the stored content, as well as the industrial or intellectual property rights contained on the Website or services.

2.- Damages, actual or potential, caused to Users derived from the operation of the Website's search tools, as well as errors generated by technical elements of the Site or the search engine.

3.- Content of Websites that Users may access with or without authorization from waitart.com.

4.- Access by individuals who do not meet the age limit required for the use of the Website, following the Terms and Conditions, as well as the current legislation regarding the capacity to act.

5.- Loss, misuse, or unauthorized use of passwords or validation codes, whether by the User or a third party, as expressed in these Terms and Conditions. Similarly, the parties acknowledge and record that the computational support provided by www.waitart.com is not infallible; therefore, circumstances beyond the control of waitart.com may occur, causing the Website or its platform to be inoperative for a certain period of time.

6.- Information related to waitart.com found on Websites other than www.waitart.com.

In the event of any of these scenarios, waitart.com will take all measures to restore the proper functioning of the Website and its communication system as soon as possible, without any liability being attributed to it for this.

waitart.com does not guarantee the availability or continuity of the Website's operation, nor that Users can access it or the promotions and offers available at any time.

Ewest Chile SpA is also not responsible for the existence of viruses or other harmful elements in the documents or files stored in the computer systems of any kind owned by Users. waitart.com will not be liable for damages caused to the User, derived from the improper use of the technologies and platforms made available to them, regardless of how these technological elements are misused. Likewise, Ewest Chile SpA will not be liable for damages caused by the improper use or bad faith of Users when using www.waitart.com.

However, in the event of a double payment by a User on the Website, waitart.com will refund the full amount of the overpayment within 7 days of receiving the corresponding claim made by the User or their representatives, which must include an annex with the original payment receipts corresponding to the overpayment made.

When registering, logging in, and communicating, www.waitart.com uses an appropriate system to encrypt the information. waitart.com does not store or retain financial data of its Users.
SÉPTIMO PROHIBICIONES\n\nPublicar en la:
SEVENTH PROHIBITIONS

Publishing phone numbers or direct contact information on the platform, whether in posts or descriptive texts of the biography, as well as posting links to contact applications such as WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Telegram, among others. Such publications are subject to sanctions deemed appropriate by waitart.com, including the potential deletion of the account without prior notice.

Encouraging other creators to acquire content outside the website. The use of external social media links is exclusively for reference or advertising purposes, not to prompt users to purchase content or make payments or money transfers outside the website.

The publication and/or sale of content involving third parties or with third parties without their consent, without holding the rights to it, or without proper authorization through a simple power of attorney and/or in situations where the identity of the third party can be distinguished, or where our moderation team determines there are doubts regarding the age or identity of the participants in the content. Such actions constitute a serious violation, risking sanctions such as temporary or permanent suspension of the waitart.com account without the right to refunds for payments made by subscribers, purchases, or donations, nor withdrawals of money from sales made before or after the publication of this content.

If a creator has an active paying subscriber, they will not be able to delete their account unless the payment is no longer valid.
OCTAVO POLÍTICA DE SEGURIDAD DE DATOS\n\:
EIGHTH DATA SECURITY POLICY

Ewest Chile SpA will take all necessary measures to safeguard the data of its Users and secret key, such as information encryption systems, security certificates, and other similar or equivalent measures that waitart.com deems prudent for these purposes. In the event of changes made by the User to the information registered or entered on the Website, or if any type of irregularity attributable to the User is detected related to the information provided by the User, as well as anything related to identification or the use of payment methods, or simply as an identity protection measure, the Website staff will contact the User, either by phone or email, to verify the data and information and to prevent possible fraud.

If contact is not established within 48 hours, and thinking about the User's security, any purchase of a product or service contract will not be confirmed. The User will be informed by phone or email that the transaction has been voided due to the inability to verify their identity or the payment method used. Additionally, the records of the efforts made to contact the User to confirm the transaction will be available to the User for a period of 15 days, in case the User wishes to confirm the purchase or contract. Additional inquiries can be made through the contact channels established in the paragraph regarding Website Information, present in this same Terms and Conditions document.

With all the above, Users are fully responsible for the loss, misuse, or unauthorized use of the acquired service, whether they or third parties are involved in the described events, after a purchase or service contract has been made following the form stipulated in these Terms and Conditions.
DATOS PERSONALES\n\nAl acceder al Sitio:
PERSONAL DATA

By accessing the Website www.waitart.com, Users or visitors guarantee that the information they provide for access or for the purchase of products or contracting services is truthful, complete, accurate, and up-to-date.

In accordance with the provisions of Law No. 19.628 on the Protection of Personal Data, such data provided to the Website becomes part of a database owned by Ewest Chile SpA and will be used solely and exclusively for the purposes that motivated its delivery, especially for communication between waitart.com and its Users, validating data related to purchases or service contracts, completing deliveries, and responding to inquiries. This data will never be communicated or shared with other companies without the express authorization of its owner (the User) nor will it be transferred internationally.

waitart.com will never request its Users to provide personal or financial data through emails.

waitart.com assumes that the data entered by Users or by persons authorized by them is correct and accurate. By accepting these Terms and Conditions, Users express their agreement that the personal data provided when filling out forms on www.waitart.com may later be used for the preparation and sending of offers that may differ from those offered on the Website.

Notwithstanding the above, Ewest Chile SpA guarantees all its Users the free exercise of the rights contemplated in Law No. 19.628 on the Protection of Personal Data regarding the information, modification, cancellation, and blocking of their personal data. Consequently, Users may make requests related to the aforementioned rights, which will be responded to by waitart.com within a period not exceeding two business days.
NOVENO COMUNICACIONES\n\nEwest Chile SpA:
NINTH COMMUNICATIONS

Ewest Chile SpA undertakes that, in the event of sending any type of communication and information, including advertising or promotions, to any contact medium provided by the User, including phone numbers or email, such communication will contain at least the following information:

1.- Identification of the type of message, making it clear to the User the type of information it is, especially if it is a message containing advertising or promotions, all of which will appear in the subject field of the message (email), or will be informed first (voice or text phone communication).

2.- Existence of the consumer's right, recognized by Chilean regulations, related to the User's ability to request the cessation of this type of message from waitart.com. At the same time, waitart.com acknowledges the obligation to suspend the sending of information if requested by the User.

3.- The guarantee of an expedited, simple, and effective process in case the User wishes to make the request, for which waitart.com may require some type of information before carrying it out.

4.- In the case of advertising or promotions from external sites, or from companies, brands, or entities associated with waitart.com, the message will contain the necessary information to identify the advertiser, including their trade name if applicable.

The promotions offered through this Website are not necessarily the same as those offered through other service channels used by companies, such as physical stores, TV or radio advertisements, catalogs, or others, unless expressly stated on this site or in the advertising carried out by the companies for each promotion.
En waitart.com, operado por Ewest Chile: At waitart.com, operated by Ewest Chile SpA, we respect and protect the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect the personal data you provide when accessing or using our website www.waitart.com.
1.- RESPONSABLE DEL TRATAMIENTO\n\nEwest:
1.- DATA CONTROLLER

Ewest Chile SpA, RUT 77.662.015-7, domiciled at Agustinas 1442 OF 402, Santiago - Chile, is the data controller of your personal data in accordance with Law No. 19.628 on the Protection of Private Life.
2.- DATOS PERSONALES RECOPILADOS\n\nPode:
2.- PERSONAL DATA COLLECTED

We may collect and store the following data when you interact with the site

Full name and email address.

Contact information and IP address.

Payment data (processed by third parties, not stored on our servers).

Information provided in registration, purchase, or inquiry forms.
3.- FINALIDAD DEL TRATAMIENTO\n\nLos dat:
3.- PURPOSE OF DATA PROCESSING

The data will be used exclusively for the following purposes

Identity validation and user authentication.

Management of purchases, contracts, and deliveries.

Direct communication with the user (relevant information, customer service, promotions).

Fraud prevention and identity verification.

Preparation of offers and promotions that may differ from those seen on the website.
4.- SEGURIDAD DE LOS DATOS\n\nEwest Chil:
4.- DATA SECURITY

Ewest Chile SpA adopts technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including

SSL security certificates.

Password encryption.

Verification processes in case of irregularities detected in registrations or payments.

If it is not possible to verify your identity or payment information within 48 hours, the purchase or transaction may be canceled for security reasons.
5.- COMPARTICIÓN DE DATOS\n\nwaitart.com:
5.- DATA SHARING

waitart.com does not share or disclose your personal data to third parties without your express consent. We also do not perform international data transfers.

We will not request confidential information via email.
6.- DERECHOS DEL USUARIO\n\nTienes derec:
6.- USER RIGHTS

You have the right to

Access your personal data.

Request its modification, cancellation, or blocking.

Object to its processing in accordance with Law No. 19.628.

You can exercise these rights by sending your request to contacto@waitart.com, which will be responded to within no more than two business days.
7.- ACTUALIZACIONES DE ESTA POLÍTICA\n\n:
7.- POLICY UPDATES

We reserve the right to update this policy at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or a prominent notification on the site.
8.- CONTACTO\n\nPara consultas sobre est:
8.- CONTACT

For inquiries about this policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at

contacto@waitart.com
